name: Shoot! (itch) (MaxVegabond)
description:
Quickly! Shoot the incoming aliens and protect your ship! 

For the best experience, play in full screen! and when you die, refresh the page to start over.

Controls

W = Shoot North

Q = Shoot North West

E = Shoot North East

A = Shoot West

D = Shoot East

Apps used: Piskel, Unity, BandLab
